questions.text: What is the purpose of the `<track>` tag, and when should it be used?

choices.a: The `<track>` tag is used for specifying subtitles. It is typically applied as a child of the `<audio>` and `<video>` tags.
choices.b: The `<track>` tag is used for specifying subtitles. It is typically applied as a child of the `<video>` tag.
choices.c: The `<track>` tag is used for specifying subtitles, captions, and other types of time-based text. It is typically applied as a child of the `<video>` tag.
choices.d: The `<track>` tag is used for specifying subtitles, captions, and other types of time-based text. It is typically applied as a child of the `<audio>` and `<video>` tag.
